ygData.subject: RE: Enchant Silver on Team PvP when not a DE
ygData.msgSnippet: Well...  if all you needed to do was sneak past the guards to buy the scroll you might be ok.  But if I were the dark elves I would probably put some guards on
ygData.messageBody:
Well... if all you needed to do was sneak past the guards to buy the scroll
you might be ok. But if I were the dark elves I would probably put some
guards on the key places like the enchant metal scrolls. It would be very
scary I think sneaking in there and a real problem if you die 8)

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Ludington [mailto:gludington@...]
Sent: Monday, August 16, 1999 9:45 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchant Silver on Team PvP when not a DE


From: "Greg Ludington" <gludington@...>

I am not a DE, but I want to begin making enchanted jewellry. Any
suggestions as to acquiring Enchant Silver on Tallon/Vallon Zek? I am
*not* going to make a mule character, but, is it possible, at lvl 8, to
use invisibility to sneak into Neriak, purchase the spell, and get out?
Is it advisable to wait until level 12 and the DE illusion? Or, is
neither approach safe, and should I just try to find a dark one willing
to betray their race for some platinum?
